meanings.definition: 傍盲腸炎（ぼうもうちょうえん）：盲腸周囲の組織の炎症。
meanings.english_definition: Inflammation of the tissues adjacent to the cecum (the pouch at the beginning of the large intestine).

examples.sentence: Paratyphlitis can be a complication of appendicitis.
examples.translation: 傍盲腸炎は虫垂炎の合併症となりうる。

etymology.value: From para- (beside, near) + typhlitis (inflammation of the cecum).
